name: National Agriculture Scholarship
description: A scholarship program aimed at providing financial support to the children of farmers pursuing higher education in agriculture-related fields.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers with an annual family income below INR 1,50,000; Must have secured at least 60% in the last qualifying examination.
benefits: Full tuition fee coverage; Monthly stipend of INR 2,000.

name: Krishi Vidya Yojana
description: A government scheme to promote agricultural education among the children of farmers by providing financial assistance.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a child of a farmer; Annual family income should not exceed INR 2,00,000; Must be enrolled in an agricultural university or college.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 50,000 per year; Additional INR 10,000 for books and materials.

name: Farmers' Child Education Scheme
description: A scheme designed to assist the children of farmers in obtaining quality education without financial burdens.
eligibility_criteria: Open to children of small and marginal farmers; Family income must be less than INR 1,75,000 per annum.
benefits: Annual scholarship of INR 25,000; Special coaching for competitive exams.

name: Agri-Scholarship for Higher Studies
description: This scholarship aims to support the higher education of farmers' children in various disciplines, with a preference for agricultural studies.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Annual family income should be below INR 2,50,000; Must have scored 70% or above in the previous academic year.
benefits: Coverage of 75% of tuition fees; Monthly stipend of INR 1,500 for living expenses.

name: Kisan Shiksha Yojana
description: A government initiative to ensure the education of farmers' children by providing financial assistance and resources.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers with a family income below INR 1,00,000; Must be enrolled in school or college.
benefits: Annual financial aid of INR 30,000; Free access to online educational resources.

name: Rural Education Promotion Scheme
description: A scheme focused on promoting education among the rural farming community by providing scholarships to their children.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a child of a farmer residing in a rural area; Family income should not exceed INR 2,00,000 per annum.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 20,000 per year; Free textbooks and study materials.

name: AgriTech Scholarship
description: A scholarship for children of farmers to pursue education in technology and innovation in agriculture.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers with a family income under INR 2,20,000; Must be pursuing a degree in agriculture technology.
benefits: Tuition fee waiver up to INR 60,000 per year; Internship opportunities in agri-tech companies.

name: Farmer's Future Scholarship
description: A scholarship aimed at supporting the children of farmers in pursuing any field of higher education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Annual family income below INR 1,50,000; Must have passed the previous academic year with 65% marks.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 40,000 per year; Mentorship programs for career guidance.

name: Kisan Vikas Yojana
description: A scheme to enhance the educational opportunities for farmers' children and ensure their holistic development.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers with a family income under INR 1,80,000; Must be enrolled in a recognized educational institution.
benefits: Annual scholarship of INR 35,000; Free educational workshops and seminars.

name: AgriPride Scholarship
description: A scholarship to support the higher education of children of farmers in prestigious institutions.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 2,50,000 per annum; Must have secured admission in a reputed college.
benefits: Scholarship covering 80% of tuition fees; INR 15,000 annual allowance for books and materials.

name: Green Future Scholarship
description: A program to support the education of farmers' children with a focus on environmental and agricultural studies.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 1,70,000; Enrolled in a course related to agriculture or environment.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 25,000 per semester; Opportunities for field trips and practical training.

name: AgriGold Scholarship
description: A scholarship to support meritorious students from farmers' families in pursuing higher education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Annual family income should not exceed INR 2,00,000; Must have excellent academic records.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 50,000 per year; Special coaching for entrance exams.

name: Krishi Pragati Yojana
description: A government scheme to ensure educational support and financial aid to farmers' children.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 2,20,000; Must be enrolled in an educational program.
benefits: Annual scholarship of INR 30,000; Free access to online courses and resources.

name: Farmers' Education Grant
description: A grant to support the children of farmers in their educational pursuits, ensuring minimal financial burden.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 1,90,000; Must have a good academic record.
benefits: Annual grant of INR 40,000; Support for purchasing educational materials.

name: AgriBright Scholarship
description: A scholarship for the children of farmers to encourage and support their higher education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income should be below INR 1,60,000; Must have scored at least 65% in the last exam.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 20,000 per semester; Free access to e-books and study guides.

name: Kisan Uday Yojana
description: A scheme aimed at providing financial assistance for the education of farmers' children.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 2,00,000; Enrolled in a recognized school or college.
benefits: Annual scholarship of INR 25,000; Free educational counseling services.

name: AgriVision Scholarship
description: A scholarship to support the vision of farmers' children pursuing higher education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Annual family income below INR 2,40,000; Must be pursuing a degree in any field.
benefits: Tuition fee support up to INR 50,000 per year; Monthly allowance of INR 1,000.

name: Krishi Suraksha Yojana
description: A scheme aimed at ensuring the educational security of farmers' children through financial assistance.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 2,10,000; Must be pursuing education in an agricultural discipline.
benefits: Scholarship of INR 30,000 per annum; Career counseling and skill development workshops.

name: Kisan Roshni Yojana
description: A government initiative to provide educational scholarships to the children of farmers for a brighter future.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Annual family income should not exceed INR 1,80,000; Enrolled in an educational institution.
benefits: Annual scholarship of INR 35,000; Access to workshops on agricultural innovations.

name: Green Harvest Scholarship
description: A scholarship program focused on nurturing agricultural talents among the children of farmers.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers; Family income below INR 2,30,000; Must demonstrate interest and commitment to agriculture.
benefits: Scholarship covering 70% of tuition fees; INR 12,000 annual stipend for research projects.

name: Maharashtra Kisan Shiksha Abhiyan
description: A state-level scholarship program in Maharashtra aimed at supporting the education of farmers' children.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers residing in Maharashtra; Family income below INR 1,50,000; Enrolled in an educational institution.
benefits: Financial assistance up to INR 25,000 per year; Additional support for educational materials.

name: Uttar Pradesh Kisan Utkarsh Yojana
description: A scheme in Uttar Pradesh aimed at providing scholarships to children of farmers for higher education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers from Uttar Pradesh; Family income should not exceed INR 1,80,000; Must be pursuing higher studies.
benefits: Scholarship amount varies based on course and institution; Support for competitive exam preparations.

name: Gujarat Krishi Sahay Yojana
description: A scheme in Gujarat to provide financial assistance to the children of farmers pursuing agricultural education.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers from Gujarat; Family income below INR 2,00,000; Must be enrolled in an agricultural course.
benefits: Scholarship covering tuition fees and living expenses; Internship opportunities in agriculture.

name: Telangana Kisan Vidyarthi Abhiyan
description: A state initiative in Telangana to support the education of farmers' children through scholarships.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers in Telangana; Family income below INR 1,70,000; Enrolled in a recognized educational institution.
benefits: Financial aid for tuition fees and educational expenses; Career guidance and skill development workshops.

name: Madhya Pradesh Krishi Kalyan Yojana
description: A scheme in Madhya Pradesh aimed at promoting agricultural education among the children of farmers.
eligibility_criteria: Children of farmers from Madhya Pradesh; Family income below INR 2,20,000; Must be pursuing education in agriculture.
benefits: Scholarship amount based on course and institution; Additional support for research projects.
